tweets.text: Decent message, but pollution doesn't just 'find its way into the River Lee (or Lea)', it is dumped, leeches & ends up there because of deliberate actions, poor infrastructure & a failure of regulation & investment from @EnvAgency & others. They can & must do better. https://t.co/ECywIh31Qi

This is 1 of only 225 #Chalkstreams in the 🌎 & this is today’s💩show on the Gaywood River @CharlieJGardner @GlavenEel @Feargal_Sharkey @jamesowild @EnvAgencyAnglia @The_WMA @N_Rivers_Trust @AnglianWater @WestNorfolkBC  How much longer must this river suffer ? https://t.co/pVGLeaiZWh

Did you know that you have something amazing on your doorstep?@WoldsWeekly @East_Riding @EYRiversTrust @CanalRiverTrust @Our_Rivers @Feargal_Sharkey @YCNature @BDSYorkshire @EnvAgencyYNE @YorksWildlife @BDSdragonflies @tophilllow @BTO_EY_H @HullLbap @WeatherWolds @Yorkshire_Wolds https://t.co/489KJH8kMP

@mayorofhackney @HackneyLabour @EnvAgency Well said Phil! 

The Lee Valley Regional Park Authority needs to follow Hackney Council's lead & call the responsible authorities to account. https://t.co/AF0QGxa8jp

Heard from sources that the @EnvAgency are planning to radically change their pollution response procedure. Will now only attend serious pollution incidents. Begs the question define serious & how would they know if they do not attend? Replace one broken system with another.

Unfortunately another incident of #flytipping that meant @EnvAgencyYNE & @Hullccnews had to team up to clear it away. As much as we love #PartnershipWorking we'd rather spend our time & resources in other ways. #StopFlytipping #LoveYourRivers #flooding https://t.co/LUh4m6QhhB

York Flood Alleviation Scheme update:

We’re setting up a site compound in Marygate car park next week to enable work to increase the height of food defences from Scarborough Bridge to Lendal Bridge, including in Museum Gardens. https://t.co/VTImbAGSJV
People have to fight not only polluting industries but now also the @EnvAgency and their own government @DefraGovUK to stop the rot. How on earth did that happen? https://t.co/oN4HCpp52u

tweets.text: Unless you live here nobody understands the extent of this environmental disaster. It’s more than a stink, it’s toxic gases @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @Greenpeace @EnvAgency @PHE_uk https://t.co/7ZAbWTW4CM

They can come to mine & experience top class landfill fumes, I’ll take the air purifier with me so they can n have the full experience. @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/p0YAi6EZLa

UPDATE 8/5/21 from @SFRS_GWilliams 
We are expecting the smoke plume to increase and decrease through the day due to activities. This will be monitored by partners for air quality and also the impacts on the M54. @shropsfire @TelfordWrekin @BBCShropshire @EnvAgency @bbcmtd https://t.co/cgI2GeY57u

tweets.text: @davemh72 @EnvAgencyMids Need to step #stopthestink up now they cannot treat human beings like this @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL find us a refuge until the poison has gone, our town is finished, my burgess ancestors will be turning in their graves. 😡

@RussellB1ggs @CharlieJGardner @GlavenEel @Feargal_Sharkey @jamesowild @EnvAgencyAnglia @The_WMA @N_Rivers_Trust @AnglianWater @WestNorfolkBC It just makes you so sad. 😞 It could and should be the heart of Gaywood and just look at it!

tweets.text: @SaveStonehenge @HighwaysEngland has undertaken ‘preliminary’ ground investigations on the route, however there may be further phosphatic chalk deposits or unstable cavities, that are not identified before construction begins. @wiltscouncil @EnvAgency should be concerned about the #Avon

tweets.text: Raw sewage in our rivers disgusting. My guess is Environmental Health Officers have been cut and privatised Water Companies taking advantage? Monetary greed is never the answer, in the end we all suffer the consequences. https://t.co/oVvdM0Otny

tweets.text: @mayorofhackney @EnvAgency Don’t ignore the extra road pollution that you are responsible for with all the road closures. So badly thought out, the idle traffic on our so called main roads is a disaster and I’m a cyclist.

@EnvAgencyMids I'm fed up of you saying there's unlikely to be 'long-term' health impacts. What about our stress & anxiety levels? Sleep deprivation? Our inability to go outside for exercise? I've cried every day this week because the odour has worsened. We've had no respite from this hell.

tweets.text:
I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

https://t.co/zslGdsV3lC

tweets.text:
A reminder for #Anglers🚨

The close season for coarse fishing is in place until June 15th.

This means no coarse fishing on rivers and streams, we do this to give fish a chance to breed🐟

If you see someone breaking this please report it to 0800 807060 #Fishing https://t.co/IIvSugN8ZW

Charities are stepping in to save children living in Newcastle under Lyme. Schools are sending letters about how toxic landfill gas is affecting children’s education. The situation is escalating. Yet @EnvAgencyMids is allowing waste back on site at Walley’s Quarry. #stopthestink https://t.co/SchV09qw1x

tweets.text: #SaturdayMorning can’t talk this morning my throat is swollen my voice is raspy the gas has engulfed my home for 12 and counting is this short term? Slept on & off all night @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MattHancock #StopTheStink give me back my life @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

Read our update to the situation at #WalleysQuarry 👉 https://t.co/o558iBcT3V

Our on-site inspection shows capping work required by the enforcement notice we issued is complete but we still need verification of the work by an independent construction quality assurance assessment https://t.co/12ep6fp39O

tweets.text: Mothers in labor been moved to other hospitals to escape the gas and your allowing this to continue shame on you #StopTheStink @EnvAgency @MattHancock @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK step up before it’s to late @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @StaffordshireCC @AaronBell4NUL this is horrendous https://t.co/kQ5thVlgE3

"The site has been breached for discharges from storm tanks during non-storm conditions."

In English. Berkhamsted STW is operating illegally by dumping sewage into the River Bulbourne, a chalk stream, 1 of only 225 in the entire world.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/SCyPhZUuaR

Today the team have worked with @EnvAgency & @AnglingTrust at #Hanningfieldresevoir to check for poaching & theft offences. Multiple licences checked with persons reported for not having rod licences. A good day of partnership working despite the 🌧. @PCJedRaven https://t.co/YaM7cTVF1e
